data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zawadzki, Cláudio Henrique, Pavanelli, Carla Simone, Langeani, Francisco (2008): Neoplecostomus (Teleostei: Loricariidae) from the upper Rio Paraná basin, Brazil, with description of three new species. Zootaxa 1757: 31-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.181836
